code: import React from'react';import ProjectCard from'./ProjectCard';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Projects=()=>{const projects=[{title:"Logistic API",description:"Developed a Logistic REST API using Spring Boot and PostgreSQL, enabling real-time tracking of loading and unloading activities.
